title: Karin Slaughter - Cold, Cold Heart [EN EPUB] [ebook] [p_s]
description:
Cold, Cold Heart: A Short Story by Karin Slaughter 
English | 2016 | Mystery & Thriller | 2 MB 

First comes love. 
Then comes marriage. 
Then comes revenge. 
In this sensational short story from the bestselling author of The Kept Woman and Pretty Girls, fifty-two-year-old Pam has done her utmost as a loyal wife to her now ex-husband John. He dropped her cruelly . . . but with a terminal illness about to claim his life, Pam now sees an opportunity to settle the score, in a way that no oneâ€”not their children, not her ex, and certainly not the readerâ€”will see coming . . . 

Surprising, suspenseful, and diabolically clever, Cold, Cold Heart offers old fans and new readers alike a taste of the writer Gillian Flynn calls â€œone of the finest crime novelists at work today.â€
